name: 2022 IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, & Signal Processing
content: Call for Papers for the 2022 IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing (ICASSP) is now open! The 2022 conference will be held in Singapore, taking place between 22-27 May 2022\. The program will include keynotes by pre-eminent international speakers, cutting-edge tutorial topics, and forward-looking special sessions. Topics of interest include but arenâ€™t restricted to, applied signal processing systems, audio & acoustic signal processing, computational imaging, machine learning, Internet of Things, signal processing for Big Data, speech & language processing, etc. Submit your paper by 6 October 2021 to be considered. Learn more about the submission process and paper guidelines here: https://2022.ieeeicassp.org/call\_for\_papers.php
